originalText.text:
My husband and I had a great experience with Dr. Allon and his team. Dr. Allon was very thorough, made me feel safe and was very kind. I was having issues seeing from far away and thanks to Dr. Allon I have excellent vision back with the eyeglasses prescription he gave me.
The team was wonderful and kind. I highly recommend to visit him because I know he will do an amazing job!

originalText.text: I had a great experience at Columbia Opticians. The staff were incredibly friendly. Dr. Nejatheim was extremely helpful and considerate. When prescribing eye glasses/ contacts he made sure to understand my needs and lifestyle. I have retinal disease in my family and offered to do a dilated eye exam after I explained my family history.

text.text: I had a great experience at Columbia Opticians. The staff were incredibly friendly. Dr. Nejatheim was extremely helpful and considerate. When prescribing eye glasses/ contacts he made sure to understand my needs and lifestyle. I have retinal disease in my family and offered to do a dilated eye exam after I explained my family history.

originalText.text: Great warm friendly service from the doctor and staff.  Dr. Nejatheim was patient, listened and through repeated trial and error did not quit until I had a good fit for my contacts and glasses.  It is also a plus that this location has several types of contacts available to try so there is no waiting for delivery as with other providers.  I highly recommend Dr. Nejatheim and his staff.

It is also a plus that this location has several types of contacts available to try so there is no waiting for delivery as with other providers.  I highly recommend Dr. Nejatheim and his staff.

originalText.text: I've been coming for several years and I always find the experience pleasant, and efficient.  The doctor and the staff are welcoming and nice.

text.text: I've been coming for several years and I always find the experience pleasant, and efficient.  The doctor and the staff are welcoming and nice.

originalText.text: Returned to Columbia Opticians after a year or two away. We live in Chelsea and the commute was becoming too much.  However after trying two opticians in Chelsea and the Village and receiving poor customer service and inaccurate information about what our excellent optical insurance covers coupled with inaccurate eyeglass prescriptions made us realize we had to travel for quality care. So up to Columbia Optician we went tolerating a very expensive cab ride.  We were so glad  that we made the decision to travel uptown!  The customer service is excellent and they have a good selection of glasses. Their secret weapon is Dr. Allon  Nejatheim!              Dr. Nejatheim is extremely patient and beyond precise! He painstakingly tweaked both my husband's and my prescriptions.  He fitted me for contact lenses which I  tried on and they felt  comfortable!  I left  wearing those contacts seeing and reading so much better than I have ever seen with contacts!  Dr. Nejatheim is truly a miracle worker!  I know my husband will be equally pleased when we pick up his glasses.  We will no longer accept less than th quality care and service that Columbia optician and Dr. Nejatheim provide and will take the pricey commute uptown as it is worth it.
